titleStmt.title: Officium eucharisticum A preparatory service, to a devout and worthy reception of the Lords supper. Designed for a person of quality; and now made publick for common use.
titleStmt.author: Lake, Edward, 1641-1704.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by T. Milbourn, for Christopher Wilkinson at the Black-Boy over against St. Dunstans Church in Fleet-street,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.

place.placeName: the Black-Boy over against St. Dunstans Church in Fleet-street
